reviewText:
This is my favorite television series.
I have purchased this entire series on
VHS Tape, DVD, and the four seasons
that are available Amazon instant video.

Put it on Blu-ray and I will buy it again.

Do you hear the sound of money
that could be yours and instead is mine?

Blu-ray Now ! ! !
Xena in blu-ray, it's awesome I can't believe it ! I hope that the next stage will be the movie ! Come on Universal !!!!!!
Must be done on bluray. Ive played the DVD on a Sony 55 inch flat screen. The picture is much too grainey and makes it unwatchable. A quality remaster would be nice as would widescreen.
I'm awaiting this so very impatiently. I grew up with this show and want nothing more than to see it on bluray! please please please come out soon.
This is my favorite tv show; Xena is the most incredible superhero ever.  I hope this set comes with spanish subtitles :)
Hell yes, I love this show. Have this already on DVD. But would buy the series again, if it comes out on Blu-ray! Would be so awesome to see this series on blu-ray!!!

they need to put this series on bluray it is a classic, and in 2008 they were planning to but didn't. it is now time for this to be released on bluray, so come on universal studios it's time, your already rereleasing the show so rerelease it on bluray!
